recipesJson.name: Parcha Coconut Yogurt by eJuice Fairy
recipesJson.author: mixinvixens
recipesJson.description: Parcha(Passion Fruit) Topped over a nice creamy coconut yogurt. It’s a delightful tropical combination that is bold and at the same time it’s smooth and not overwhelming. It’s a nice summer creamy dessert that can be chilled with a little WS23 for a frozen yogurt treat.

reviews.text: This is a winner! I like it so much I'm making 100ml as we speak (adding 0.5% Super Sweet) and pooring it into my favorite RTA. For me that means a lot. Thank you for sharing and congratz.

pageContext.name: Parcha Coconut Yogurt by eJuice Fairy
